headline: Jim Cramer on Hershey Company: “It’s Probably Close to a Bottom”
summary: The Hershey Company (NYSE:HSY) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shed light on. Cramer discussed the company’s struggles over the last couple of years, as he remarked: “Why has this iconic candy maker become such a heinous stock? The truth is, Hershey’s been struggling for the last two and a half years. Now, I […]
